name: Sai Kireeti Chalamalasetty
tagline: Generative AI Intern | MS in Computer Science
about_me: I am a detail-oriented Computer Science graduate student experience in software development, AI, and machine learning. I specialize in full-stack web development, 3D modeling, and predictive analytics. I am passionate about creating innovative, user-focused solutions and continuously advancing my skills to drive organizational growth and success.

projects.name: Meshy API Web APP
projects.description: Developed a Web app with Meshy API integration to generate exclusive 3D models.

experience.title: Generative AI Intern
responsibilities: Generative AI Development: Designed and optimized AI models for 3D object generation, implementing deep learning algorithms, running experiments, and analyzing results to drive improvements.
Web Application Creation: Developed a seamless image-to-3D conversion tool using the Meshy API, featuring a React.js interface and efficient API handling with Node.js.
User-Friendly: Delivered modular, scalable, and user-centric code to ensure high usability and adaptability for future enhancements.

experience.title: Associate Analyst
responsibilities: Data Structuring and Cleaning: Organized survey data into categorized tables, cleaning raw datasets (.CSV, ASCII) to retain relevant information and ensure data accuracy for research analysis.
Survey Analysis: Analyzed single-choice, multi-choice, and open-ended responses, utilizing analytical tools to extract actionable insights and ensure alignment with study goals and assigned quotas.
Thematic Analysis and Reporting: Conducted thematic analysis of open-ended responses, identifying key patterns to support research conclusions and deliver structured, accurate reports.

experience.title: Web Developer Intern
responsibilities: Web Design and Development: Designed and developed visually appealing web pages to showcase a diverse selection of furniture and kitchenware products, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Shopping Cart Functionality: Created a responsive and intuitive shopping cart page, enabling smooth product ordering and checkout processes.

Cross-Browser Compatibility and Testing: Ensured design consistency and functionality across multiple web pages, performing thorough testing and debugging to guarantee cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness.

publications.title: Covid Alert System: A Smart Security System to Alert Violations of Covid Protocol Using OpenCV
publications.authors: P. Kiran Kumar, CH. Sai Kireeti, I. Durga Sindhu, B. Vidya Yasaswini, A. Dhana Satish
